main event: On August 6, 1967, a witness observed a bright, disk-shaped object with flashing lights hovering in the sky over New York, New York.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 feet in diameter and hovered silently before accelerating rapidly,The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes,The witness observed the object from his backyard at approximately 10:15 pm,Investigators found no physical trace evidence at the scene,The case remains classified as UNIDENTIFIED and is still open.
sighted object: a bright, disk-shaped object with flashing lights
witness description: Mr. John Smith, a resident of New York
